Author: AtmoOmen
AdventurerPlateThroughInspect.Description: Add a button to check the adventure plate while inspecting a player.
AdventurerPlateThroughInspect.Title: Check Adventurer Plate While Inspecting

Author: AtmoOmen
Alphascape3Helper.Description: The duty action Omega Jammer will be executed repeatedly and automatically on Conductive Focus during the duty Alphascape V3.0.
Alphascape3Helper.Title: Alphascape V3.0 Helper

Author: Fragile
AutoAcceptInvitation.Description: Automatically accept party invitations from players who satisfy certain conditions after proper configurations.
AutoAcceptInvitation.Title: Auto Accept Party Invitation

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoActionAlignCamera.Description: Make some actions always cast in the current camera direction
AutoActionAlignCamera.Title: Auto Force Actions To Camera Direction

Author: 那年雪落
AutoAddChatPrefixSuffix.Description: After configurations, given prefixes or suffixes would be automatically added to chat messages while they're sent.
AutoAddChatPrefixSuffix.Title: Auto add chat prefixes and suffixes

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoAdventure.Description: After clicking start, automatically complete all Sightseeing Log allowed under the current time/weather
AutoAdventure.Title: Auto Sightseeing Log

Author: YLCHEN
AutoAetherialReduction.Description: Aetherial reduction will be performed automatically for all the items with this option available after the user starts aetherial reduction in the interface.
AutoAetherialReduction.Title: Auto Aetherial Reduction

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoAethericMimicry.Description: Automatically pop up a dedicated interface to choose players around with specified roles if casting Aetheric Mimicry without a target.
AutoAethericMimicry.Title: Auto Aetheric Mimicry

Author: Fragile
AutoAllowMultipleGames.Description: Allow the user to run multiple game instances simultaneously. The original cap is 2.
AutoAllowMultipleGames.Title: Auto Allow Multiple Game Instances

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoAntiCensorship.Description:
发送消息/编辑招募描述时, 自动在屏蔽词内部加点, 或是将其转成拼音以防止屏蔽
接收消息时, 自动阻止屏蔽词系统工作, 显示消息原文
AutoAntiCensorship.Title: 自动反屏蔽词

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoAntiKnockback.Description: Automatically apply the selected logic to handle forced movements like knockback/pull when encountered
AutoAntiKnockback.Title: Auto Anti Knockback

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoAttireItems.Description: Automatically retrieve all the gears which could be stored as a set from Glamour Dresser and save these gears as sets while accessing the Outfit Glamour interface. The module requires manual start.
AutoAttireItems.Title: Auto Process Items In Gear Sets

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoBlockMisdirectionState.Description: Automatically block the status with limited direction controls (like Temporary Misdirection or Spinning) and invalidate related processing logic.
AutoBlockMisdirectionState.Title: Auto Block Misdirection Status

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoBlockShutdownFromLobbyError.Description: While encountering a lobby error, the module will automatically prevent game exiting. Instead, it will return to the login page.
AutoBlockShutdownFromLobbyError.Title: Auto prevent game exiting from lobby errors

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoBlockStatus.Description: After configuration, automatically block client-side reception and processing of specified status effects
AutoBlockStatus.Title: Auto Block Status Effect

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoBlockSystemNotice.Description: Automatically block system notifications sent within the game (Purple Word Bulletin)
AutoBlockSystemNotice.Title: Auto Block System Notice

Author: Xww
AutoBroadcastActionHitInfo.Description: Automatically use content hint and TTS to report specified action crit/direct hit info after configuration
AutoBroadcastActionHitInfo.Title: Auto Report Actions Critical & Direct Hits

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoCancelCast.Description: Auto cancel cast when the target is dead or cannot be selected.
AutoCancelCast.Title: Auto Cancel Cast

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoCancelFSHAnimation.Description: All the action locks after performing fishing actions will be removed in order to improve the efficiency.
AutoCancelFSHAnimation.Title: Auto Cancel Fishing Animations

Author: Bill
AutoCancelMountCast.Description: Automatically cancel mount cast in given scenarios after proper configurations.
AutoCancelMountCast.Title: Auto Cancel Mount Cast

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoCancelNPCEmote.Description: Auto cancel NPC emotes and the waiting time they caused during cutscenes.
AutoCancelNPCEmote.Title: Auto Cancel NPC Emotes

Author: Shiyuvi
AutoCancelStarContributor.Description: After entering the areas related to Cosmic Exploration, regularly check whether the Star Contributor status is applied and cancel it if is.
AutoCancelStarContributor.Title: Auto Cancel Star Contributor

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoChakraFormShift.Description: If the current job is MNK, automatically use Steeled/Forbidden Meditation and Form Shift upon entering a Duty, triggering a Retry, or exiting Combat.
AutoChakraFormShift.Title: Auto Meditation and Form Shift

Author: Siren
AutoChangeBattleEffectLevel.Description: Automatically adjust the visibility settings of battle effects based on the area and the number of players nearby after proper configurations.
AutoChangeBattleEffectLevel.Title: Auto Adjust Battle Effect Visibility

Author: JiaXX
AutoChangeKeyboardLayout.Description: Automatically switch to specified keyboard layouts while in-game text boxes gain or lose focus after proper configurations.
AutoChangeKeyboardLayout.Title: Auto Switch Keyboard Layout

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoCheckFoodUsage.Description: Automatically check the status of consumed food, and replenish specific food when the remaining time falls below the threshold
AutoCheckFoodUsage.Title: Auto Check Self Food Status

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoCheckItemLevel.Description: Automatically check the item level of all party members after entering a duty and highlight those with abnormal item levels
AutoCheckItemLevel.Title: Auto Check Item Level

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoClaimItemIgnoringMismatchJobAndLevel.Description: Ignore the warnings popped up caused by the level or the job of the character while purchasing, exchanging or just claiming items from shops.
AutoClaimItemIgnoringMismatchJobAndLevel.Title: Auto Ignore Lvl And Job Warnings While Purchasing

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoClaimPVPRewards.Description: Auto claim all pending series rewards after open Series Malmstones UI and click start
AutoClaimPVPRewards.Title: Auto Claim Trophy Crystals

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoCollectableExchange.Description: Open the Collectables Submission window, and after clicking start, automatically trade all available Collectables in that category
AutoCollectableExchange.Title: Auto Trade Collectables

Author: Cindy-Master
AutoCommenceDuty.Description: Auto confirm the commencing duty window
AutoCommenceDuty.Title: Auto Duty Commence

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoConfirmMateriaWork.Description: Auto confirm Materia melding/retrieval/meld request and remove delay restrictions before and after melding
AutoConfirmMateriaWork.Title: Auto Confirm Materia Melding And Retrieval

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoConfirmPortraitUpdate.Description: When the portrait update preview interface appears, click OK automatically to update the portrait to the latest equipment status.
AutoConfirmPortraitUpdate.Title: Auto Confirm Portrait Updates

Author: AtmoOmen
KirisameVanilla
AutoConstantlyClick.Description: Holding down any hotbar key will automatically switch to rapid repeated presses of that key
AutoConstantlyClick.Title: Auto Click Repeatedly

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoConstantlyInspect.Description: Auto click the "Continue" button when the Item Appraisal Result interface appears
AutoConstantlyInspect.Title: Auto Item Appraisal

Author: KirisameVanilla
AutoConvertMapLink.Description: Convert any text contains coordinates to actual coordinates on the map automatically.
AutoConvertMapLink.Title: Auto Convert Texts With Coordinates

Author: Fragile
AutoCosmicExplorationLeveling.Description: Automatically accept quests and level up in Cosmic Exploration for Disciples of the Land or Hand after proper configurations and clicking start.
AutoCosmicExplorationLeveling.Title: Auto Level Up In Cosmic Exploration

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoCosmicFortune.Description: A floating window will be displayed below Cosmic Exploration Exotablet for rolling Cosmic Fortune if the current amount of Lunar Credits is enough for at least one roll. A command /pdr cosfortune for the same purpose will also be provided. Rolls could also be performed after the given credit threshold is reached.
AutoCosmicFortune.Title: Auto Cosmic Fortune

Author: ToxicStar
AutoCountBlacklisted.Description: Number of Blacklist players within the range in Server Info Bar
AutoCountBlacklisted.Title: Auto Count Players In Blacklist Nearby

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoCountPlayers.Description: Number of players with a search widget in Server Info Bar
AutoCountPlayers.Title: Auto Count Players Nearby

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoCuffACur.Description: Automatically farm Cuff-a-Cur repeatedly after clicking start in Gold Saucer or interacting with relevant machines.
AutoCuffACur.Title: Auto Cuff-a-Cur

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoCutsceneSkip.Description: Auto skips all skippable cutscenes, and remove skip restrictions including but not limited to Main Scenario, Ocean Fishing, Crystalline Conflict.
AutoCutsceneSkip.Title: Auto Skip Cutscenes

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoDance.Description: When using dancer action Standard/Technical Step, the corresponding dance step actions will be automatically used.
AutoDance.Title: Auto Dance

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoDesynthesizeItems.Description:
Auto confirm when the desynthesis interface opened;
Open the desynthesis interface and click start, it'll desynthesis all
AutoDesynthesizeItems.Title: Auto Item Desynthesis

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoDisableBattleBGM.Description: Automatically disable battle music during a combat and keep playing BGM instead.
AutoDisableBattleBGM.Title: Auto Disable Battle Music

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoDiscard.Description: Auto discard or sell items in presets
AutoDiscard.Title: Auto Discard Items

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoDismount.Description: Auto dismount when you are trying to use available actions on mount.
AutoDismount.Title: Auto Dismount

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoDisplayDutyReadyLeftTime.Description: Automatically display remaining time for Ready Check.
AutoDisplayDutyReadyLeftTime.Title: Auto Display Ready Check Remaining Time

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoDisplayFateItemCount.Description: Display the number of FATE items the character is currently possessing and has submitted nearby FATE information if the character is engaging a FATE involves item collections.
AutoDisplayFateItemCount.Title: FATE Item Counter

Author: Middo
AutoDisplayIDInfomation.Description: Automatically display various internal IDs belong to items, weathers, status, actions, etc.
AutoDisplayIDInfomation.Title: Auto Display IDs

Author: HaKu
AutoDisplayMitigationInfo.Description: The actual percentage of all the mitigation currently applied, including the mitigation status on the character and the mitigation actions applied on the target, will be displayed in Server Info Bar.
AutoDisplayMitigationInfo.Title: Auto Display Mitigation Details

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoDisplayMSQProgress.Description: If there're main scenario quests to be completed, display the number of remaining main scenario quests and the progress percentage in the Main Scenario Guide interface.
AutoDisplayMSQProgress.Title: Auto Display MSQ Progress

Author: Due
AutoDisplayPlayerHitbox.Description: Automatically draw a customizable icon at the hitbox of the character, in order to better indicate the exact position.
AutoDisplayPlayerHitbox.Title: Auto Display Character Hitbox

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoDrawMotifs.Description: If the current job is Pictomancer, automatically use available Motiff actions upon entering or recommencing a duty, or exiting combat
AutoDrawMotifs.Title: Auto Draw Motifs

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoEliminateFishAwareness.Description: After configuration, if an alert appears in the current fishing spot, switch zones to clear the alert and cast again at the same location
AutoEliminateFishAwareness.Title: Auto Clear Fishing Spot Alert

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoEnableAttack.Description: Auto enable Auto-Attack for all jobs when entering combat
AutoEnableAttack.Title: Auto Enable Attack

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoExpertDelivery.Description: Auto finish expert delivery after click start on the supply and provisioning missions interface.
AutoExpertDelivery.Title: Auto Expert Delivery

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoFaceCameraDirection.Description: Automatically make the character orient to the camera direction.
AutoFaceCameraDirection.Title: Auto Orient To Camera Direction

Author: Fragile
AtmoOmen
AutoFate.Description: Auto completely FATEs in specified areas according to presets made by the user after proper configurations and clicking start.
AutoFate.Title: Auto FATE

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoFateStart.Description: If there is a nearby FATE that requires dialogue to start, automatically initiate it.
AutoFateStart.Title: Auto Start FATE

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoFateSync.Description: Auto level sync when entering a FATE range
AutoFateSync.Title: Auto FATE Level Sync

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoFCWSDeliver.Description: Open the Material Delivery interface and, upon clicking "Start," automatically deliver all available materials
AutoFCWSDeliver.Title: Auto FC Workshop Deliver Items

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoGardensWork.Description: Auto or semi-auto finish garden related operations, including planting, harvesting, fertilization, care, etc
AutoGardensWork.Title: Auto Gardening

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoGatherDiadem.Description: Automatically gather specified materials for skyward score or leveling up after configurations and clicking start in The Diadem.
AutoGatherDiadem.Title: Auto Gather In The Diadem

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoGathererRoleActions.Description: Automatically use abilities from other gathering classes when switching to any gathering class
AutoGathererRoleActions.Title: Auto Use Gatherer Role Actions

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoGuaranteeCarryingObject.Description: Move underground while carrying objects in non-instanced areas, to prevent dropping due to monster attacks. (The module won't affect once the quest target is selected or while the character is moving in a sanctuary)
AutoGuaranteeCarryingObject.Title: Safe Object Carrying

Author: Veever
AutoGysahlGreens.Description: If you are currently outside the city area and your chocobo partner has not been summoned or the remaining time is less than 5 minutes, you will automatically use Gysahl Greens.
AutoGysahlGreens.Title: Auto Use Gysahl Greens

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoHandleTeleportStuck.Description: Automatically execute the teleportation last time if users get stuck in teleportation with the message "无法发动传送，其他传送正在进行。".
AutoHandleTeleportStuck.Title: Auto Clear Teleportation Stuck

Author: XSZYYS
AutoHideBanners.Description: Automatically prevent specified texts (like Quest Accepted or Quest Complete) from popping up and their corresponding sound effects from being played after proper configurations.
AutoHideBanners.Title: Auto Hide Popups

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoHideExpBar.Description: Automatically hide the experience bar if the current job reaches its full level.
AutoHideExpBar.Title: Auto Hide Exp Bar

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoHideGameObjects.Description: Automatically hide the models of specified objects after proper configurations, in order to improve the game performance and prioritize the rendering of important objects.
AutoHideGameObjects.Title: Auto Hide Game Objects

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoHideNeedlessPopups.Description: Automatically hide unnecessary popups such as Near-complete Achievements, Fellowship Notifications, Playguide, Recommended Duties, and Active Help
AutoHideNeedlessPopups.Title: Auto Hide Unnecessary Popups

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoHighlightCursor.Description: Automatically apply a highlighted background at the cursor’s position in order to emphasize it.
AutoHighlightCursor.Title: Auto Highlight Cursor

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoHighlightFlagMarker.Description: When placing a flag, automatically use Waymarks to create a light pillar to highlight the destination.
AutoHighlightFlagMarker.Title: Auto Highlight Map Flag

Author: HaKu
AutoHighlightStatusAction.Description: Automatically highlight the action when its corresponding status is going to expire after proper configurations.
AutoHighlightStatusAction.Title: Auto Highlight Actions Based On Status

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoHolmgangSelf.Description: When using the Warrior action Holmgang, force target self.
AutoHolmgangSelf.Title: Auto Holmgang Self

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoHummer.Description: After interacting with a Crystal Tower Striker game console, auto and repeatedly play the mini-game.
AutoHummer.Title: Auto Crystal Tower Striker

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoHuntingLog.Description: Automatically complete all the monster hunting entries of the specified job or the specified Grand Company, except for those have to be completed in duties.
AutoHuntingLog.Title: Auto Complete Hunting Log

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoIgnoreLoginLock.Description: Automatically cancel the "请稍后再登录。" login cooldown which would be applied after cancelling a character login action.
AutoIgnoreLoginLock.Title: Auto Cancel Login Cooldown

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoIgnorePortraitLimitation.Description: Automatically ignore the restrictions during creating a portrait, such as the weapon shouldn't cover the character face or the camera position shouldn't be too high.
AutoIgnorePortraitLimitation.Title: Auto Ignore Portrait Restrictions

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoImmunizeForceMove.Description: Automatically nullify walking-based forced movement status effects on self
AutoImmunizeForceMove.Title: Auto Immunize Forced Movement

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoImmunizeInputDisable.Description: Automatically nullify conditions or status effects that disable input
AutoImmunizeInputDisable.Title: Auto Nullify Input Lock

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoImmunizeJumpRestriction.Description: When the user is given a jump restriction by a status or the zone, the module will automatically make the user immune to it and remove related restrictions.
AutoImmunizeJumpRestriction.Title: Auto immune to jump restrictions

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoImmunizeThinIce.Description: When the user is given a status similar to Thin Ice, the module will automatically make the user immune to it and remove related effects.
AutoImmunizeThinIce.Title: Auto immune to Thin Ice

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoInDutySelectYes.Description: Automatically confirm, proceed, or answer “Yes” to interaction prompts and similar dialogs in duty.
AutoInDutySelectYes.Title: Auto Confirm In Duty

Author: Yangdoubao
AutoInventoryTransfer.Description: If there're several interfaces which allow item storage (like inventory or saddlebag) available at the moment, the module will provide shortcuts to shuttle items between interfaces by simply clicking items while holding the interrupt hotkey.
AutoInventoryTransfer.Title: Auto Shuttle Between Interfaces

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoJoinExitDuty.Description: Add /pdr joinexitduty command for quick join-exit of duty
AutoJoinExitDuty.Title: Auto Join-Exit Duty

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoJumboCactpot.Description: Auto finish all of today's Jumbo Cactpot after opening its interface
AutoJumboCactpot.Title: Auto Jumbo Cactpot

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoLeaveDuty.Description: Auto exit upon completion of non-blacklisted duties
AutoLeaveDuty.Title: Auto Leave Duty

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoLeveQuests.Description: Automatically repeat selected levequest up to max allowances after confirm current settings and click "Start"
AutoLeveQuests.Title: Auto Finish Tradecraft Leves

Author: status102
AutoLockGameWindow.Description: Automatically lock the game window after starting a combat to prevent accidentally being dragged.
AutoLockGameWindow.Title: Auto Lock Game Window

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoLogin.Description: Automatically login to the first available character based on configured priority after entering the main title screen.
AutoLogin.Title: Auto Login

Author: qingsiweisan
AutoLucidDreaming.Description: If the current job can use Lucid Dreaming and is not a Black Mage, automatically use Lucid Dreaming when MP falls below the specified threshold.
AutoLucidDreaming.Title: Auto Lucid Dreaming

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoManageInterruptAction.Description: If the current target is not casting an interruptible action, prevent the use of interrupt actions (e.g., Interject, Head Graze)
AutoManageInterruptAction.Title: Auto Manage Interrupt Actions

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoManagePeloton.Description: Automatically prevent executing Peloton if the character is in combat.
AutoManagePeloton.Title: Auto Manage Peloton

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoMarkAetherCurrents.Description: Auto mark aether currents on map, replace the vanilla UI with DR UI, allowing custom display of aether currents and teleport or auto navigation to the designated aether current.
AutoMarkAetherCurrents.Title: Auto Mark Aether Currents

Author: AtmoOmen
KirisameVanilla
AutoMarksFinder.Description: Auto scan and organize hunt mobs info into a list after configuring.
AutoMarksFinder.Title: Auto Hunt Mobs Finder

Author: Fragile
AutoMateriaAttach.Description: Automatically meld materia with gears in batches after importing melding plans from external websites.
AutoMateriaAttach.Title: Auto Meld Materia

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoMaterialize.Description: Automatically extracts materia from all the equipment under selected category when you open Materia Creation and click "Start"
AutoMaterialize.Title: Auto Extract Materia

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoMateriaRetrive.Description: When retrieving any gear's materia, retrieve all.
AutoMateriaRetrive.Title: Auto Retrieve Materia

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoMateriaTransmutation.Description: Open the Materia Transmutation interface, and after clicking Start, automatically select and transmute Materia.
AutoMateriaTransmutation.Title: Auto Transmute Materia

Author: Bill
AutoMaximiseWindow.Description: Automatically maximize the game window every time the module is loaded if the screen mode is set to windowed and provide a command /pdr maxwin for the same purpose.
AutoMaximiseWindow.Title: Auto Maximize Window

Author: Wotou
AutoMessageScheduler.Description: Automatically send given texts after proper configurations including beginning time, intervals and repetition times.
AutoMessageScheduler.Title: Auto Send Messages As Schedule

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoMiniCactpot.Description: Auto finish all of today's Mini Cactpot after opening its interface
AutoMiniCactpot.Title: Auto Mini Cactpot

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoMJIGather.Description: Automatically loop gathering Island Sanctuary items after finishing configuration and clicking start
AutoMJIGather.Title: Auto Gather In Island Sanctuary

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoMJIWorkshopImport.Description: 允许从剪贴板导入外部无人岛生产计划, 并一键自动安排 (仅支持国服作业集格式)
AutoMJIWorkshopImport.Title: 自动无人岛工房生产计划

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoMonsterToss.Description: Automatically farm Monster Toss repeatedly after clicking start in Gold Saucer or interacting with relevant machines.
AutoMonsterToss.Title: Automatically farm Monster Toss repeatedly after clicking start in Gold Saucer or interacting with relevant machines.

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoMoveGearsNotInSet.Description: Automatically retrieve all gears not included in any valid set from the Armory Chest after use
AutoMoveGearsNotInSet.Title: Auto Retrieve Gears Not In Sets

Author: 逆光
AutoMovePetCenter.Description: After summoning a creature in a duty or after entering a duty, automatically move the Pet to the center of the current zone.
AutoMovePetCenter.Title: Auto Move Pet To Center

Author: Wotou
AutoMovePetPosition.Description: After configuring and entering an eight-player duty, if there is a Pet summoned by the user, the Pet will automatically move according to the positions set in the timeline.
AutoMovePetPosition.Title: Auto Move The Pet

Author: Due
AutoNotifyBonusFate.Description: After entering zones of 4.0 or later, while a FATE with bonus appears, a notification will be automatically sent to remind.
AutoNotifyBonusFate.Title: Auto Bonus FATE Notification

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNotifyChaoticRaidBonus.Description: Notify the user when chaotic raid bonus is available in the current data center or the data center the user subscribed.
AutoNotifyChaoticRaidBonus.Title: Auto Chaotic Raid Bonus Notification

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNotifyCutsceneEnd.Description: Automatically send a notification after all the party members finish their cutscenes in duty. The module would only work if at least one party member watches the cutscene for more than 5 seconds.
AutoNotifyCutsceneEnd.Title: Auto Cutscene End Notification

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNotifyDiademWeather.Description: Automatically notify the user after the subscribed special weathers appear while the character is in The Diadem.
AutoNotifyDiademWeather.Title: Auto Diadem Weather Notification

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNotifyDutyConfirm.Description: Automatically send a notification when the Duty Confirm window appears
AutoNotifyDutyConfirm.Title: Auto Duty Commence Notification

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNotifyDutyName.Description: Auto notify the duty name, the item level requirements and other related information while entering a duty.
AutoNotifyDutyName.Title: Auto Duty Information Notification

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNotifyDutyStart.Description: Auto notifies the start of duty when duty starts
AutoNotifyDutyStart.Title: Auto Notify While Duty Starts

Author: HSS
AutoNotifyLeveUpdate.Description: Auto notifies the date that the limit reached when the leve allowances refresh
AutoNotifyLeveUpdate.Title: Auto Leve Allowance Renewal Notification

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNotifyMessages.Description: Auto notifies when the selected message type comes in or a new message contains a specific keyword
AutoNotifyMessages.Title: Auto Unread Message Notification

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNotifyReadyCheck.Description: Automatically send notification reminders when a readiness confirmation is received
AutoNotifyReadyCheck.Title: Auto Ready Check Notification

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNotifyRecruitmentEnd.Description: Auto notifies when the recruitment ends for any reason
AutoNotifyRecruitmentEnd.Title: Auto Recruitment End Notification

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNotifySPPlayers.Description: Automatically send an alert and execute custom text commands when pre-specified special player appear
AutoNotifySPPlayers.Title: Auto Notify While Specific Player Appears

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNoviceNetwork.Description: Auto try to join the Novice Network after clicking "Start"
AutoNoviceNetwork.Title: Auto Join Novice Network

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoNumericInputMax.Description: Set all number input components to always be at their maximum value
AutoNumericInputMax.Title: Auto Set Numeric Input Max

Author: KirisameVanilla
AutoOpenMapLinks.Description: After configuration, automatically open the map link when the specified player sends or the specified chat type receives it
AutoOpenMapLinks.Title: Auto Open Map Link in Chat

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoOpenTreasures.Description: After entering a duty, try to open all the available treasure coffers around automatically.
AutoOpenTreasures.Title: Auto Open Treasure Coffers

Author: 逆光
AutoOutOnALimb.Description: Automatically farm Out on a Limb repeatedly after clicking start in Chocobo Square.
AutoOutOnALimb.Title: Auto Out On A Limb

Author: yamiYori
AutoPeloton.Description: If the current class/job is a physical ranged DPS, Peloton will automatically be executed while moving.
AutoPeloton.Title: Auto Peloton

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoPetFollow.Description: Automatically command the pet to follow after combat if the pet is available.
AutoPetFollow.Title: Auto Pet Following

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoPlayerCommend.Description: Commend your corresponding party member after a duty run.
AutoPlayerCommend.Title: Auto Commend Party Member

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoPreserveCollectable.Description: When the confirmation window for gathering items as Collectables appears, auto click confirm
AutoPreserveCollectable.Title: Auto Confirm Collectable Preservation

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoPreventDuplicateStatus.Description: A duplicate check will be performed before executing certain actions in order to prevent some status from being applied repeatedly in a short time.
AutoPreventDuplicateStatus.Title: Auto Prevent Duplicate Actions

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoQTE.Description: Automatically pass all the active time maneuvers (also known as QTE) in duty.
AutoQTE.Title: Auto Active Time Maneuvers

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoQuestAccept.Description: Auto clicks the confirm button when the quest access interface appears
AutoQuestAccept.Title: Auto Confirm Quest Accepting

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoQuestComplete.Description: Auto clicks the confirm button when the quest complete interface appears
AutoQuestComplete.Title: Auto Confirm Complete Quests

Author: Veever
AutoRecommendFauxHollows.Description:
When you open the Faux Hollows interface, the current optimal solution will be highlighted automatically according to your settings.
(Highlight colour: Blue → Twin Swords / Pink → Treasure Box, Gift Box / Gold → Faux)
AutoRecommendFauxHollows.Title: Faux Hollows Solver

Author: Due
AutoRecordSubTimeLeft.Description: 登录时, 自动记录保存当前账号剩余的游戏时间, 并显示在服务器信息栏
AutoRecordSubTimeLeft.Title: 自动记录剩余游戏时间

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRedirectDashActions.Description: Automatically redirects the destination of some displacement skills to the current mouse pointer.
AutoRedirectDashActions.Title: Auto Redirect Dash Action

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRefocus.Description: Auto refocuses the target if the lost focus target appears again in duties
AutoRefocus.Title: Auto Refocus Target

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRefreshMarketSearchResult.Description: Auto re-requests when the market board item search result is "Please wait"
AutoRefreshMarketSearchResult.Title: Auto Refresh Market Search Results

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRefreshPartyFinder.Description: Auto refreshes the recruitment board at a regular interval after opening it
AutoRefreshPartyFinder.Title: Auto Refresh Party Recruitment

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRefuseTrade.Description: Automatically decline trade requests, send notification messages and execute additional custom text commands when receiving trade requests
AutoRefuseTrade.Title: Auto Refuse Trade Request

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRemoveAnimationLockPunishment.Description: Automatically remove the 100ms animation lock that is added to all skills after use, and automatically block the mandatory animation lock data packets sent by the server to improve the smoothness of using and weaving various skills
AutoRemoveAnimationLockPunishment.Title: Auto Remove Action Animation Lock

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRemoveArmoireItemsFromDresser.Description: Automatically retrieve all the gears which could be stored in Armoire from Glamour Dresser. The module requires manual start.
AutoRemoveArmoireItemsFromDresser.Title: Auto Retrieve Armoire Items From Glamour Dresser

Author: ECSS11
AutoRemoveDuplicateGlamours.Description: Automatically retrieve duplicate items from Glamour Dresser. The module requires manual start.
AutoRemoveDuplicateGlamours.Title: Auto Retrieve Duplicates From Glamour Dresser

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRemoveDuplicateModelGlamours.Description: Automatically retrieve items with the same model from Glamour Dresser. The module requires manual start.
AutoRemoveDuplicateModelGlamours.Title: Auto Retrieve Identical Items From Glamour Dresser

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRemoveStatusSpeedPenalty.Description: When the user is given a status which could slow the user down, the module will automatically make the user immune to the speed penalties caused by the status.
AutoRemoveStatusSpeedPenalty.Title: Auto Remove Speed Penalties From Status

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRemoveWalkableCastingActionSpeedPena.Description: Remove the speed reduction while executing the actions which allow players to walk during casting the actions.
AutoRemoveWalkableCastingActionSpeedPena.Title: Auto remove speed penalties of walking cast actions

Author: 逆光
AutoRenewRecruitment.Description: Automatically renew user's party recruitment while the remaining time is running low after configurations.
AutoRenewRecruitment.Title: Auto Renew Recruitment

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRepair.Description: Auto detects the equipped gears durability and repairs them when fall below the set threshold, removing the pre- and post-repair delay restrictions.
AutoRepair.Title: Auto Repair

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRepeatChatMessage.Description: Add a following button   to every message in chat, in order to quickly repeat the message.
AutoRepeatChatMessage.Title: Auto Repeat Chat Message

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoReplaceActionAnimation.Description: Automatically replace the animations of specified actions with animations from different actions.
AutoReplaceActionAnimation.Title: Auto Replace Action Animation

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoReplaceActionLowLevel.Description: When high level actions are unavailable due to level sync, automatically replace them with their low level counterparts.
AutoReplaceActionLowLevel.Title: Auto Replace Low Level Actions

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoReplaceLocationAction.Description: Upon entering a duty, automatically redirect the placement of ground-targeted actions to the center of the area
AutoReplaceLocationAction.Title: Auto Redirect Ground-Targeted Actions

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoReplaceLowBlowWithInterject.Description: If the current target is chanting an interruptible skill and Interject is available, replace Low Blow with Interject in the Hotbar.
AutoReplaceLowBlowWithInterject.Title: Auto Replace Low Blow With Interject

Author: Wotou
AutoReplyChatBot.Description: Automatically reply messages using the specified large language model with given prompts after proper configurations.
AutoReplyChatBot.Title: Auto Chat Bot Reply

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRequestItemSubmit.Description: Auto select items and complete the submission when submitting items
AutoRequestItemSubmit.Title: Auto Submit Items

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRestoreFurniture.Description: Open the Furniture UI and click "Start" to automatically retrieve all storeroom furniture into the inventory/placed furniture into the storeroom
AutoRestoreFurniture.Title: Auto Restore Furniture

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoRetainerWork.Description: Automatically or semi-automatically complete retainer-related tasks, including price adjustment for sales, collecting venture rewards, splitting/retrieving gil, and changing registered city
AutoRetainerWork.Title: Auto Retainer Work

Author: KirisameVanilla
AutoRetarget.Description: After configuration, automatically retarget when the current player has no target
AutoRetarget.Title: Auto Retarget

Author: Xww
AutoReuseEmote.Description: Add /pdr remote <Emote Name/Command> (<Interval (ms)>) to repeat an emote with the given interval (2000ms by default).
AutoReuseEmote.Title: Auto Reuse Emotes

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoSellCards.Description: Automatically sell all the cards to Card Buyer for MGP after clicking start in the Card Buyer interface, including auto confirmation of card selling operations.
AutoSellCards.Title: Auto Sell Cards

Author: status102
AutoSendMoney.Description: After configuration, automatically trade the specified amount of gils in bulk with the designated targets
AutoSendMoney.Title: Auto Gil Trade

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoSharpenInterfaceText.Description: Automatically HD-enhance blurry texts with improved rendering in some interfaces, in order to make them more accessible.
AutoSharpenInterfaceText.Title: HD-enhanced Interface Texts

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoShopPurchase.Description: Auto purchase items from the specified shop list after config setup and clicking start
AutoShopPurchase.Title: Auto Repeat Shop Purchase

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoShowDutyGuide.Description: 进入副本后, 自动以悬浮窗形式显示来自"新大陆见闻录"网站的副本攻略
AutoShowDutyGuide.Title: 自动显示副本攻略

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoShowFrontlineKillCount.Description: Emphasize the number of players knocked down so far every time a player was knocked down by self for a better sense of achievement.
AutoShowFrontlineKillCount.Title: Auto Emphasize KO In Frontline

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoSkipBuddyFeedScene.Description: While feeding your companion in the Chocobo stable, automatically skip the cutscenes and complete the feeding immediately.
AutoSkipBuddyFeedScene.Title: Auto skip cutscenes of feeding Chocobo

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoSnipeQuest.Description: Auto avoid and change snipe quests into completed when starting snipe quests.
AutoSnipeQuest.Title: Auto Finish Snipe Quest

Author: 那年雪落
AutoSortItems.Description: After configurations, the items in the inventory and armoury will be automatically sorted according to the preset rules while switching zones.
AutoSortItems.Title: Auto Sort Items

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoSoulsow.Description: If current job is Reaper, automatically use Soulsow after: entering or recommencing a duty, or leaving combat
AutoSoulsow.Title: Auto Soulsow

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoSpeedMultiplier.Description: Automatically adjust the speed multiplier of the character in different scenarios and provide the command /pdrspeed to adjust the multiplier temporarily.
AutoSpeedMultiplier.Title: Auto Speed Multiplier

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoSpeedUpGather.Description: If the current job is Miner or Botanist, all the action locks after performing gathering actions will be removed during gathering in order to accelerate the process. The module will keep the efficiency in check to prevent from being forced to disconnect by the server.
AutoSpeedUpGather.Title: Auto Accelerate Gathering

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoSplitStacks.Description: Allow quick item splitting into specified quantities via right-click or preset options
AutoSplitStacks.Title: Auto Split Items

Author: Due
AutoStellarSprint.Description: Automatically execute Stellar Sprint in the zones related to Cosmic Exploration while the current job is a Disciple of the Land or Hand.
AutoStellarSprint.Title: Auto Stellar Sprint

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoStoreToCabinet.Description: Automatically store all the applicable gears to Armoire. The module requires manual start.
AutoStoreToCabinet.Title: Auto Store To Armoire

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoSubmarineCollect.Description: Automatically collect rewards from concluded subaquatic voyages and re-assign new voyages after accessing the company submersible interface.
AutoSubmarineCollect.Title: Auto Collect Subaquatic Voyages

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoSummonPet.Description: Auto summon pets when entering duty or retrying if you are SMN or SCH
AutoSummonPet.Title: Auto Summon Pet

Author: ECSS11
AutoSwitchGlamourJobCategory.Description: Automatically switch to the category corresponds to the character's job at the moment while accessing Glamour Dresser.
AutoSwitchGlamourJobCategory.Title: Auto Switch Job Category In Glamour Dresser

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoTalkSkip.Description: Automatically skip a dialog when it emerges
AutoTalkSkip.Title: Auto Skip Dialogue

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoTankStance.Description:
If it is currently a protective class, the shield posture is automatically enabled after entering the replica
Auto tank stance when entering duties if you are tank
AutoTankStance.Title: Auto Tank Stance

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoTenChiJin.Description: Allow users to set all the 7 kinds of Ninjutsu to the hotbars. The process of making mudras will be automatically completed in order after the user clicks a Ninjutsu.
AutoTenChiJin.Title: Auto Ninjutsu

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoThrottleTenChiJin.Description: When weaving Shinobi, each Shinobi action can only be pressed once during the sequence.
AutoThrottleTenChiJin.Title: Auto Throttle Shinobi Actions

Author: Wotou
AutoTimedLogout.Description: Automatically log out the character, exit the game and shut down the device at the given time after proper configurations.
AutoTimedLogout.Title: Auto Logout

Author: Fragile
AutoTrackStatusOff.Description: Automatically track the status on other players which are given from self, and report if the status is manually removed by the player.
AutoTrackStatusOff.Title: Auto Track Status Disappearance

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoUfoCatcher.Description: Auto repeat Moogle's Paw after interacting with the game machine.
AutoUfoCatcher.Title: Auto Moogle's Paw

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoUnlockAllContents.Description: Unlock all the duties in local for information in Party Finder and Duty Finder.
AutoUnlockAllContents.Title: Auto Unlock All Duties

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoUnlockAllOrchestrionsListen.Description: Auto unlock preview for all orchestrion rolls (marks all rolls as obtained)
AutoUnlockAllOrchestrionsListen.Title: Auto Unlock All Orchestrions

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoUnlockExpertDelivery.Description: Ignoring rank requirements, directly unlock the Expert Delivery feature after joining any Grand Company
AutoUnlockExpertDelivery.Title: Auto Unlock Expert Delivery

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoUnlockMapDiscoverZone.Description: Automatically reveal all the undiscovered areas in local clients so that the character don't have to explore personally.
AutoUnlockMapDiscoverZone.Title: Auto Reveal Undiscovered Areas

Author: Shiyuvi
AtmoOmen
AutoUseCrafterGathererManual.Description: If the current job is crafter and gatherer, is not at max level, holds any valid survival science/engineering manual, and does not have the corresponding experience bonus effect, the corresponding manual item will be automatically used
AutoUseCrafterGathererManual.Title: Auto Use DoH/DoL Exp Manuals

Author: ToxicStar
AutoUseEarthsReply.Description: After using the skill Riddle of Earth in a PVP zone, automatically use the skill Earth's Reply when its duration is about to end to prevent it from expiration
AutoUseEarthsReply.Title: Auto Earth's Reply

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoUseEventItem.Description: When interacting with objects that require quest items and opening the Key Item inventory, automatically use the corresponding quest item
AutoUseEventItem.Title: Auto Use Quest Event Item

Author: Cindy-Master
AutoUseItemStacks.Description: Add right-click menu option for batch-using stackable items if they are usable
AutoUseItemStacks.Title: Auto Use Stackable Items

Author: 逆光
Bill
AutoUseMountAction.Description: Automatically execute mount actions while riding on specified mounts after proper configurations.
AutoUseMountAction.Title: Auto Mount Action

Author: AtmoOmen
AutoVeryEasyQuestBattle.Description: Automatically set the difficulty of single player quest battles to "Very Easy" before commencing.
AutoVeryEasyQuestBattle.Title: Auto Commence Very Easy Battles

Author: 逆光
AutoWoof.Description: Auto constantly Bark when mounted on Megashiba
AutoWoof.Title: Auto Megashiba Bark

Author: AtmoOmen
BaitSwitchCommand.Description: Add the command /pdr bait <Item ID / Item Name / Item Name Pinyin> to allow switching bait via command.
BaitSwitchCommand.Title: Bait Switching Commands

Author: AtmoOmen
BanEscToCancelCast.Description: Pressing the Esc key during casting will no longer interrupt the current casting process
BanEscToCancelCast.Title: Disable Esc Key To Interrupt Casting

Author: AtmoOmen
BetterBlacklist.Description: Provide a better Blacklist which is with enhanced functions, including saving an unlimited number of players in the list, importing and exporting lists, editing shared Blacklists online with others and etc. The module is fully compatible with vanilla Blacklist.
BetterBlacklist.Title: Better Blacklist

Author: AtmoOmen
BetterBlueSetLoad.Description: Optimized loading of active sets in the Blue Magic Spellbook interface, allowing active sets switching without removing Aetheric Mimicry.
BetterBlueSetLoad.Title: Better Blue Mage Active Set

Author: AtmoOmen
BetterCommandInput.Description: Automatically converts incorrect case and full/half-case commands to correct commands when entering commands.
BetterCommandInput.Title: Better Command Input

Author: AtmoOmen
BetterFateProgressUI.Description: Replace the native game interface with the module interface, enabling instant switching without loading, real-time data updates, and right-click quick teleportation support
BetterFateProgressUI.Title: Better FATE Progress UI

Author: HSS
Xww
BetterFollow.Description: Unlocks the game's native follow target limitation, and is able to automatically lock on to the target and re-follow it.
BetterFollow.Title: Better Auto Follow

Author: AtmoOmen
BetterFPSLimitation.Description: Allow users to set the frame rate cap to any number rather than the fixed options provided by the game, add a frames per second indicator in Server Info bar and provide an interface to quickly adjust the frame rate cap.
BetterFPSLimitation.Title: Better Frame Rate Cap

Author: Fragile
BetterMarketBoard.Description: New command /pdr market to pop up the better market board provided by the module, for better price inquiries, purchasing and price monitoring.
BetterMarketBoard.Title: Better Market Board

Author: XSZYYS
BetterMountRoulette.Description: Provide a better Mount Roulette which allows users to set dedicated lists for specified zones individually and assign an unlimited number of mounts to a list.
BetterMountRoulette.Title: Better Mount Roulette

Author: decorwdyun
BetterPartyFinderSort.Description: Let the recruitments in Party Finder be sorted by the exact value of the remaining time.
BetterPartyFinderSort.Title: Better Party Finder Sorting

Author: Due
BetterStatusTimeDisplay.Description: After configurations, the remaining time of status with long durations will be displayed in the selected format.
BetterStatusTimeDisplay.Title: Display the status time better

Author: AtmoOmen
BetterTeleport.Description: Replace the vanilla teleportation interface with a Daily Routines one, which provides better searching, navigation and destination previews and allows players to directly teleport to any aethernet shard in the city.
BetterTeleport.Title: Better Teleportation

Author: Cindy-Master
BetterWaitCommand.Description: Remove native time and precision limits for "wait" in text commands
BetterWaitCommand.Title: Better Wait Command

Author: AtmoOmen
BlockInputWhenFishing.Description: During casting, most unrelated key inputs are blocked to prevent accidental interruption of the fishing process
BlockInputWhenFishing.Title: Block Input During Fishing

Author: AtmoOmen
BrayfloxsLongstopHelper.Description: After entering the duty Brayflox's Longstop, automatically talk with the goblin pathfinder and get the Runstop Headgate key.
BrayfloxsLongstopHelper.Title: Brayflox's Longstop Helper

Author: AtmoOmen
ChineseNumericalNotation.Description: Display numbers in units of ten thousand "wan" and one hundred million "yi" and separate the numbers by ten thousands instead of thousand according to Chinese custom.
ChineseNumericalNotation.Title: Chinese Number Format

Author: AtmoOmen
ClipboardMultiLineToOneLine.Description: When pasting text in the game, multi-line text is forced to be converted into a single line to facilitate editing and sending.
ClipboardMultiLineToOneLine.Title: Auto Make Pasted Texts Single Line

Author: AtmoOmen
CompanyCreditExchangeMore.Description: Allow to purchase up to 255 items in a single Company Credits exchange.
CompanyCreditExchangeMore.Title: Better Company Credits Exchange

Author: AtmoOmen
ContentFinderCommand.Description: A new command /pdrduty for better Duty Finder registrations.
ContentFinderCommand.Title: Duty Finder Command

Author: Nukoooo
CopyItemNameContextMenu.Description: Add the option "Copy Item Name" in the right-click menu for all the items in the game.
CopyItemNameContextMenu.Title: Copy Item Name For All

Author: AtmoOmen
CrossDCPartyFinder.Description: 为队员招募界面新增大区切换按钮, 以选择并查看由众包网站提供的其他大区的招募信息
CrossDCPartyFinder.Title: 跨大区队员招募

Author: AtmoOmen
CustomActionQueueTime.Description: Customize the queue time for default and specific actions in the skill queue (time before next GCD)
CustomActionQueueTime.Title: Custom Action Queue Time

Author: HSS
CustomizeGameObject.Description: Customize the scaling of various in-game entities based on presets
CustomizeGameObject.Title: Customize Game Object Scale

Author: AtmoOmen
CustomizeInterfaceText.Description: Replace and customize all in-game text according to presets saved
CustomizeInterfaceText.Title: Customize Interface Text Replacement

Author: AtmoOmen
CustomizeSightDistance.Description: Customize the maximum sight distance allowed by the current game camera.
CustomizeSightDistance.Title: Custom sight distance

Author: AtmoOmen
DisableGroundActionAutoFace.Description: Using ground-targeted actions (e.g., Asylum, Earthly Star) will no longer change the current facing direction
DisableGroundActionAutoFace.Title: Disable Facing Direction Change for Ground-Targeted Actions

Author: Errer
DisregardFollowQuest.Description: The character would be undetectable in all the sneaking quests.
DisregardFollowQuest.Title: Be Undetectable In Sneaking Quests

Author: Middo
DungeonLoggerUploader.Description: 配置完成后, 当进入“随机任务：指导者”任务副本并完成时, 自动记录并上传相关记录数据至 DungeonLogger 网站
DungeonLoggerUploader.Title: 随机任务：指导者任务记录上传助手

Author: AtmoOmen
ExpandActionRange.Description: Extend all the action ranges, including melee actions and ranged actions, by a specified amount.
ExpandActionRange.Title: Extended Action Range

Author: HSS
ExpandItemMenuSearch.Description: Add additional search entry to the item subcommand menu
ExpandItemMenuSearch.Title: Expanded Item Right-click Menu Search

Author: AtmoOmen
ExpandMacroTargetParameters.Description: Add more parameters available in macros which could be used to refer to various targets in different situations or scenarios.
ExpandMacroTargetParameters.Title: Extended Macro Parameters

Author: AtmoOmen
ExpandPlayerMenuSearch.Description: Add extra search options to the right-click menu of players.
ExpandPlayerMenuSearch.Title: Expanded Player Right-click Menu Search

Author: AtmoOmen
ExpandTargetRadius.Description: After configuration, expand the target radius by the specified range beyond its original size.
ExpandTargetRadius.Title: Expand Target Radius

Author: Marsh
ExtraBlueSet.Description: Allow the user to save more Blue Mage active sets by a new floating window next to Blue Magic Spellbook, and provide the command /pdr exblueset to quickly switch among active sets.
ExtraBlueSet.Title: Extra Blue Mage Active Set

Author: AtmoOmen
FastBLUSpellbookSearchBar.Description: Add a quick search bar to the upper left corner of Blue Magic Spellbook, to search in real time based on action names.
FastBLUSpellbookSearchBar.Title: Search Bar In Blue Magic Spellbook

Author: AtmoOmen
FastContentsFinderRegister.Description: Provide various registration shortcuts in Duty Finder which allows to join a duty with convenient prefabricated settings.
FastContentsFinderRegister.Title: Better Duty Finder Registration

Author: AtmoOmen
FastCustomDeliveriesInfo.Description: Optimize the custom deliveries interface to display clients with increased rewards this week and add quick action options, such as teleportation, for these clients.
FastCustomDeliveriesInfo.Title: Quick Custom Deliveries Information Interface

Author: AtmoOmen
FasterTerritoryTransport.Description: Speed up all in-zone loading to reduce character disable time during loading
FasterTerritoryTransport.Title: Faster In-Zone Loading

Author: AtmoOmen
FastGrandCompanyExchange.Description: Added a quick exchange floating window in the Company Seals Exchange interface, so you can instantly exchange it for the corresponding item by entering the item name directly.
FastGrandCompanyExchange.Title: Quickly Exchange Seals For Items

Author: AtmoOmen
KirisameVanilla
FastInstanceZoneChange.Description: Provide better instance switching with detailed instance information, which supports several subsequent actions like auto retry, auto mounting/dismounting and auto teleportation. Switching could be performed by executing the command /pdr insc. A graphical interface is also available and could be accessed by clicking the shortcut in Server Info Bar.
FastInstanceZoneChange.Title: Better Instance Switching

Author: AtmoOmen
FastJoinAnotherPartyRecruitment.Description: A new "Leave Then Join" button would be introduced in the party recruitment detail interface, which allows to leave the current recruitment party and then join the new desired one in a very short time by one-clicking.
FastJoinAnotherPartyRecruitment.Title: Leave PF Party Then Join Another

Author: Rorinnn
FastMinimizeWindow.Description: Provide new commands /pdr mini/tray as well as a button in order to make game window minimization more convenient.
FastMinimizeWindow.Title: Better Window Minimization

Author: AtmoOmen
FastObjectInteract.Description: Add an overlay listing nearby interactable objects, allowing quicker interactions through direct clicks
FastObjectInteract.Title: Fast Object Interaction

Author: AtmoOmen
FastResetAllSDEnmity.Description: Resetting enmity from a single Striking Dummy will clear enmity from all dummies, and a command is added for manual clearing
FastResetAllSDEnmity.Title: Fast Reset All Striking Dummy Enmity

Author: YLCHEN
FastRetainerStore.Description: Add a right-click menu for the item interface on retainers to facilitate storage and retrieval of items in the same category.
FastRetainerStore.Title: Better Retainer Storage

Author: AtmoOmen
FastRidePillion.Description: Auto ride pillion when you right-click a party member that is riding a multi-seat mount
FastRidePillion.Title: Fast Ride Pillion

Author: AtmoOmen
FastSetWeatherTime.Description: Provide a dedicated interface composed of vanilla game assets which allows users to set time and weather as wish. Combinations of time and weather based on areas could be saved for auto application purposes. The interface could be accessed by clicking the weather icon on the minimap or executing the command /pdr wt.
FastSetWeatherTime.Title: Set Time And Weather As Wish

Author: AtmoOmen
FastTeleportPanel.Description: Provide a fast teleportation panel for teleporting to any location in the current zone.
FastTeleportPanel.Title: Fast Teleportation Panel

Author: AtmoOmen
FastWorldTravel.Description:
Provide better World Visit with detailed world information, which allows to register on World Visit anywhere in the three major cities and to start an auto World Visit process anywhere but not in duty. World Visit could be performed by executing the command /pdr worldtravel. A graphical interface is also available and could be accessed by clicking the shortcut in Server Info Bar.
支持快捷超域旅行并实时显示各服务器超域旅行拥挤度 [国服特供]
FastWorldTravel.Title: Better World Visit

Author: AtmoOmen
FCMemberManagePanel.Description: Add a new window to the FC Member UI for quick search, sorting, and batch operations on members
FCMemberManagePanel.Title: FC Member Manage Panel

Author: AtmoOmen
FieldEntryCommand.Description: Added /pdrfe <Parameter/Instance Name> (Case insensitive / Partial match for the latter), to enter specified field operation
FieldEntryCommand.Title: Field Operations Entry Command

Author: Rorinnn
FrontlineMapRadar.Description: Automatically provide key information on the map while in Frontline, including health & location of loaded players nearby and countdown & tactical point of objectives.
FrontlineMapRadar.Title: Frontline Map Radar

Author: AtmoOmen
FrontlinePlayerRadar.Description: After entering Frontline, the location of all players could be detected nearby would be marked and displayed on the screen.
FrontlinePlayerRadar.Title: Frontline Player Radar

Author: AtmoOmen
GlamourPlateApplyCommand.Description: Add the /pdr gpapply <number> (starting from 1) command to quickly switch between the saved Glamour Plates
GlamourPlateApplyCommand.Title: Glamour Plate Switching Commands

Author: HaKu
HealerHelper.Description: If the current job is a healer profession, the use of specific skills will be optimized according to the settings when using them.
HealerHelper.Title: Healer Helper

Author: AtmoOmen
HullbreakerIsleHelper.Description: After entering the duty Hullbreaker Isle, automatically mark all the iron leg traps on the ground and all the mimics that need to be contacted.
HullbreakerIsleHelper.Title: Hullbreaker Isle Helper

Author: AtmoOmen
IgnoreActionTargetBlocked.Description: Ignore the game's internal detection mechanism that prevents action use due to the target being obstructed when casting
IgnoreActionTargetBlocked.Title: Ignore Action Target Obstruction Status

Author: AtmoOmen
IgnoreTransparencyWait.Description: Cancel the waiting time of NPC fading in and fading out while talking with NPCs.
IgnoreTransparencyWait.Title: Auto Cancel NPC Fade-in And Fade-out

Author: AtmoOmen
IgnoreTurnAndLookAtWait.Description: Cancel the waiting time of NPC turning and sight adjusting while interacting with NPCs if the user isn't within a certain angle in front of NPCs.
IgnoreTurnAndLookAtWait.Title: Auto Cancel NPC Turn And Sight Adjustments

Author: Siren
IgnoreWindowMinSizeLimit.Description: Automatically remove the minimum size limit of the game window, so that user could resize the window even smaller.
IgnoreWindowMinSizeLimit.Title: Auto Ignore Minimum Window Size

Author: AtmoOmen
InstantDismount.Description: Upon attempting to dismount, immediately step down to the ground.
InstantDismount.Title: Instantly Dismount

Author: AtmoOmen
InstantFullSpeed.Description: Remove the acceleration process of the character and allow the character to immediately accelerate to the full speed after starting moving.
InstantFullSpeed.Title: Instant Full Speed

Author: AtmoOmen
InstantLeaveDuty.Description: Remove all duty exit restrictions and forcefully leave the current instance.
InstantLeaveDuty.Title: Instantly Leave Duty

Author: AtmoOmen
InstantLogout.Description: Remove all logout/exit restrictions and force return to the title screen/exit the game
InstantLogout.Title: Instant Logout

Author: AtmoOmen
InstantPlaceLocationAction.Description: Automatically and instantly cast ground-targeted action at the mouse pointer without requiring further confirmation
InstantPlaceLocationAction.Title: Instantly Place Ground-Targeted Action

Author: AtmoOmen
InstantReturn.Description: Remove the cast time and cooldown from Return.
InstantReturn.Title: Infinite Return

Author: AtmoOmen
InstantTeleport.Description: Remove the cast time from Teleport.
InstantTeleport.Title: Instant Teleportation

Author: AtmoOmen
InvulnerableMode.Description: Add /pdr invulnerable command. This command allows User to become invulnerable to attacks.
InvulnerableMode.Title: Invulnerable Mode

Author: AtmoOmen
JobSwitchCommand.Description: Add a new command /pdr job < job ID / job name / job name in pinyin > (case insensitive, partial inclusive) to switch to the specified job.
JobSwitchCommand.Title: Job Switching Commands

Author: AtmoOmen
LargerColorantColoringPreviewComponent.Description: Provide magnified dye previews in related interfaces for better visibility and details.
LargerColorantColoringPreviewComponent.Title: Magnified Dye Preview

Author: AtmoOmen
LargerIME.Description: Allow users to customize the interface scaling of input method editors and provide clearer texts.
LargerIME.Title: Magnified IME Option Interface

Author: AtmoOmen
LimitlessTargetDashAction.Description: Allow dash actions that require a target to ignore distance limits and be able to execute instantly upon selecting a target
LimitlessTargetDashAction.Title: Disable Range Limits Of Gap Closer Actions

Author: AtmoOmen
LiveAnonymousMode.Description:
Obfuscate all player names and models in the game to encrypt gameplay information.
(This is not an actual modification and does not affect non-model-related plugins, but be aware that other plugin interfaces may still reveal information.)
LiveAnonymousMode.Title: Live Anonymous Mode

Author: AtmoOmen
LocalFlightMode.Description: Remove all the flight restrictions in the current zone and allow the character to fly in local.
LocalFlightMode.Title: Local Flight Mode

Author: AtmoOmen
MacroIntoActionQueue.Description: Enable action queueing for all the actions, user macros and items.
MacroIntoActionQueue.Title: Action Queueing For Macros

Author: status102
MarkerInPartyList.Description: Display target markers before member names in the party list
MarkerInPartyList.Title: Display Target Markers in Party List

Author: AtmoOmen
MoreFlexibleMJIWorkdays.Description: Provide schedules could be applied conveniently in a floating window once the Isleworks Agenda interface pops up, and remove the restriction of two days off per week.
MoreFlexibleMJIWorkdays.Title: Better Workshop Schedule

Author: Ponta
MoreMessageFilterPresets.Description: Allows the user to save an unlimited number of chat log filter presets and to apply filters to any chat tabs via proper configurations or the right-click menu of the chat log window.
MoreMessageFilterPresets.Title: More Chat Log Filters

Author: AtmoOmen
MoveableDeathState.Description: Allow the current character to move normally even when in a dead state.
MoveableDeathState.Title: Moveable After Death

Author: KirisameVanilla
MultiTargetTracker.Description: After configuration, continuously track multiple active players' positions using field markers and record historical data
MultiTargetTracker.Title: Multi-Target Tracker

Author: Marsh
NameplateIconAdjustment.Description: Adjust the scale and the position offset of all the signs (the marks above selectable objects) after proper configurations.
NameplateIconAdjustment.Title: Sign Adjustments

Author: AtmoOmen
NeverreapHelper.Description: After entering the duty Neverreap, automatically talk with Tonu Vanu and get the thunder eggs.
NeverreapHelper.Title: Neverreap Helper

Author: Nyy
YLCHEN
NoAutoClosePartyFinder.Description: While the members in the current recruitment change, prevent the party finder interface from being closed and re-open the recruitment which the user was just reading if applicable.
NoAutoClosePartyFinder.Title: Auto Hold Party Finder Interface

Author: Errer
NoClipMode.Description: Disable all in-game collision detection, allowing character movement without being blocked by terrain or obstacles
NoClipMode.Title: Noclip Mode

Author: 逆光
NoFallDamage.Description: Prevent all the fall damage from being applied.
NoFallDamage.Title: No Fall Damage

Author: AtmoOmen
NoHideHotbars.Description: No longer hide some UI(e.g. hotbars) because of special operations automatically.
NoHideHotbars.Title: Always display UI

Author: Siren
NoRenderWhenBackground.Description: When game is in background, disable rendering to reduce idle resource usage and power consumption (does not affect any game functions except visuals)
NoRenderWhenBackground.Title: Disable Background Game Rendering

Author: AtmoOmen
NoUIFade.Description: Disable in-game black screens and fade-ins/outs used for transitions to reduce unnecessary waiting time during loading
NoUIFade.Title: No Black Screen While Loading

Author: Fragile
OccultCrescentHelper.Description: Provide assistance for the duty Occult Crescent including quick teleportation, CE / FATE notifications, auto coffer marking & opening, auto buff renewals, quick job switching, getting instance ID and etc.
OccultCrescentHelper.Title: Occult Crescent Helper

Author: AtmoOmen
OptimizedBorderlessWindow.Description: Provide a better Borderless Windowed screen mode, where the game window will no longer pop up if users access the Windows right-click menu when the game window is running in the background.
OptimizedBorderlessWindow.Title: Better Borderless Windowed

Author: Middo
OptimizedCastBar.Description: Provide a better cast bar with adjustable appearance in many elements and slidecast indicators.
OptimizedCastBar.Title: Better Cast Bar

Author: Middo
OptimizedCharacterClass.Description: Provide better interfaces for Classes/Jobs in PVE and Character in PVP which allows users to switch between jobs by clicking job icons or names.
OptimizedCharacterClass.Title: Better Classes And Jobs Interface

Author: Middo
Xww
OptimizedChatBubble.Description: Provide better chat bubbles which allow user to customize their availability in combat, the maximum number of text lines, the duration and etc.
OptimizedChatBubble.Title: Better Chat Bubble

Author: Mizami
Cyf5119
OptimizedDutyFinderSetting.Description: Provide a bar above Duty Finder which contains a row of buttons correspond to various Duty Finder settings, in order to make these settings more accessible.
OptimizedDutyFinderSetting.Title: Better Duty Finder Settings

Author: AtmoOmen
OptimizedEnemyList.Description: Provide a better enmity list with detailed information of target health, enmity and action cast in vanilla game interface.
OptimizedEnemyList.Title: Better Enmity List

Author: AtmoOmen
OptimizedFreeCompanyChest.Description: Provide a better Company Chest which has no mandatory action interval applied, allows users to shuttle items by right clicking and to customize the default page, shows useful information and statistics nearby, and etc.
OptimizedFreeCompanyChest.Title: Better Company Chest

Author: AtmoOmen
OptimizedFreeShop.Description: Provide a better reward interface which doesn't require users to confirm repeatedly and allows users to claim all the gears belong to a job at once.
OptimizedFreeShop.Title: Better Reward Interface

Author: AtmoOmen
OptimizedFriendList.Description: Provide a better friend list that users are able to search friends efficiently, player names and servers of friends marked as "(Unable to Retrieve)" could be retrieved as usual, and users could add nicknames/comments for friends or inquire previous names of friends.
OptimizedFriendList.Title: Better Friend List

Author: AtmoOmen
OptimizedInteraction.Description: Optimized game interaction logic by removing interaction restrictions when objects are out of sight, obstructed, positioned too high or low, during character jumps, or while low-altitude flying.
OptimizedInteraction.Title: Game Interaction Optimization

Author: AtmoOmen
OptimizedLetter.Description: Provide a better letter system with improved attachment collection & letter deletion, a friend search bar while designating a recipient and no "Reward/Purchase Delivery Request" cooldown.
OptimizedLetter.Title: Better Letters

Author: AtmoOmen
OptimizedLongCastTimeAction.Description: If the cast time of an action is greater than or equal to its recast time, automatically shorten the cast time by 0.4 seconds.
OptimizedLongCastTimeAction.Title: Optimize Actions With Long Cast Time

Author: AtmoOmen
OptimizedQuickPanel.Description: Provide a better Command Panel and Command Panel commands. A lock button would be introduced in order to pin Command Panel on the screen, so that the panel would adopt the same interaction logic as Hotbar and never be hidden due to ESC input, area switching or interactions. The commands /quickpanel and /快捷面板 could also take a page number as the parameter for direct access of a specific page.
OptimizedQuickPanel.Title: Better Command Panel

Author: AtmoOmen
OptimizedRecipeNote.Description: Provide a better Crafting Log which allows users to switch to the job corresponding to recipes, offers recipe solution suggestions accompany with one-click executions, and supports macro importing, exporting and visually previewing.
OptimizedRecipeNote.Title: Better Crafting Log

Author: AtmoOmen
OptimizedTargetInfo.Description: Provide better Target Bar and Focus Target Bar with more detailed and helpful information including target health, actions casting and cast time, zoom in the status applied on targets by self and allow users to quickly disable the focus target.
OptimizedTargetInfo.Title: Better Target Bar

Author: status102
PartyFinderFilter.Description: Intelligently filter and display recruitment information that meets the requirements based on multiple rules
PartyFinderFilter.Title: Party Finder Filter

Author: status102
PartyFinderSettingRecord.Description: Persistently save the recruitment details filled in the interface, and automatically populate them the next time the interface is opened
PartyFinderSettingRecord.Title: Auto Save Recruitment Edit Info

Author: AtmoOmen
PermanentDisconnectStatus.Description: Keep the online status as 'Disconnected' permanently (without affecting other operations)
PermanentDisconnectStatus.Title: Permanent Disconnected Online Status

Author: AtmoOmen
PetSizeContextMenu.Description: Add size adjustment options to summoner's pet right-click menu
PetSizeContextMenu.Title: Pet Size Context Menu

Author: 逆光
PFPageSizeCustomize.Description: Allows customization of the number of listings per page in Party Finder, with a maximum of 100 listings per page
PFPageSizeCustomize.Title: Customize Party Finder Page Size

Author: AtmoOmen
PlaceFurnitureAnywhere.Description: Automatically remove all the placement restrictions of indoor and outdoor furnishings, allowing to place furnishings as wish.
PlaceFurnitureAnywhere.Title: Better Furnishing Placement

Author: AtmoOmen
PlayerTargetInfoExpand.Description: Allow customization of the information displayed in the Target Info after selecting a target
PlayerTargetInfoExpand.Title: Player Target Info Expand

Author: Yarukon
PortraitAnimationTimeEditor.Description: Allow the user to capture the emote by each frame while editing portraits.
PortraitAnimationTimeEditor.Title: Portrait Emote Frame By Frame

Author: AtmoOmen
ProhibitMountFlightRestrction.Description: Prevent the application of 'Hoofing It' debuff and 'No Aether Currents Beyond This Point' restriction (e.g., inside Island Sanctuary buildings)
ProhibitMountFlightRestrction.Title: Remove Hoofing It & No Aether Current Beyond This Point Limitation

Author: AtmoOmen
ProhibitSwimming.Description: Automatically prevents the character from entering the swimming state in swimmable areas, allowing the character to run on water and use actions
ProhibitSwimming.Title: Prohibit Swimming

Author: AtmoOmen
QueueCombatTeleport.Description: Automatically remove the restriction that the teleportation menu couldn't be accessed in combat, hold teleportation requests received during combat for later, and respond to them immediately after combat.
QueueCombatTeleport.Title: Auto Hold Teleportation In Combat

Author: AtmoOmen
QuickChatPanel.Description:
Add a panel for quickly sending/copying preset text, macros, or in-game special icons.  
(Note: Not compatible with Chat 2)
QuickChatPanel.Title: Quick Chat Panel

Author: AtmoOmen
RealPositionInNaviMap.Description: Display the actual coordinate of the character below the minimap and allow users to mark or copy by clicking.
RealPositionInNaviMap.Title: Actual Coordinate Below Minimap

Author: 逆光
Nukoooo
RealQueuePosition.Description: Automatically display the actual queue position when it states "After #50" while registering on Duty Finder or World Visit.
RealQueuePosition.Title: Display Actual Queue Position

Author: AtmoOmen
RightClickToMoveMode.Description: Enable moving to target location by right-clicking the ground
RightClickToMoveMode.Title: Right-click Movement

Author: AtmoOmen
SameAethernetTeleport.Description: Allow users to teleport to the aetheryte or aethernet shard they're currently at.
SameAethernetTeleport.Title: Allow To Teleport To The Current Aetheryte Or Shard

Author: AtmoOmen
SastashaHelper.Description: After entering the duty Sastasha, automatically acquire the colour given by the bloody memo and highlight the correct coral.
SastashaHelper.Title: Sastasha Helper

Author: Cyf5119
ScrollableTabs.Description: Make some tabs in game could be switched by scrolling the middle button of the mouse.
ScrollableTabs.Title: Scrolling Switching Of In-game Tabs

Author: AtmoOmen
SelectableRecruitmentText.Description: Make the recruitment text be selectable to facilitate copying precisely and provide link parsing, jumping and other life quality functions.
SelectableRecruitmentText.Title: Selectable Recruitment Texts

Author: AtmoOmen
ShopDisplayRealItemIcon.Description: The category icons in front of entries will automatically be replaced by actual item icons in shop interfaces.
ShopDisplayRealItemIcon.Title: Display Actual Item Icon In Shops

Author: AtmoOmen
SoundEffectThrottler.Description: Automatically limit the playback frequency of system sound effects (<se.>) based on config
SoundEffectThrottler.Title: Sound Effect Throttler

Author: AtmoOmen
SpecialRenderMode.Description: Provide some special rendering modes like "Disable World Rendering Except User Interfaces" or "Disable User Interface Rendering Except Adventurer Plates", for dedicated purposes such as screenshots or role playing.
SpecialRenderMode.Title: Special Rendering Modes

Author: AtmoOmen
TargetDashActionNoMove.Description: Disable movement of the character when executing a gap closer action.
TargetDashActionNoMove.Title: Disable Gap Closer Effects

Author: AtmoOmen
TheCuffOfTheFatherHelper.Description: Automatically highlight all the bombs and make bombs unselectable if the character is not on a magitek gobwalker G-VII in the duty Alexander - The Cuff of the Father.
TheCuffOfTheFatherHelper.Title: Alexander Cuff Of Father Helper

Author: 逆光
ThePraetoriumHelper.Description: After entering the duty "The Praetorium" and mounting the magitek reapers, the module will shot the Magitek Cannon towards the optimal AOE position nearby.
ThePraetoriumHelper.Title: The Praetorium Helper

Author: Due
WeeklyBingoClickToOpen.Description: Automatically jump to a qualified duty in Duty Finder after clicking a duty card in the Wondrous Tails interface.
WeeklyBingoClickToOpen.Title: Jump To Duties In Wondrous Tails
